meanings: move about one's arms and legs limply
개인 신상 He has long arms and legs.
피부과 I've got a rash on my arms and legs.

vlive.korean: [STEP 8][몸통 한쪽 면에 빨대로 만든 팔다리를 풀로 붙여줍니다] 정확했어! [STEP 8][Glue the arms and legs onto one side of the body] It was perfect! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 재하효빈의 소원인형👩‍👦 (HOW TO MAKE JAEHA&HYOBIN’s wish dolls)
vlive.english: [STEP 8][Glue the arms and legs onto one side of the body] It was perfect!

vlive.korean: 팔 다리도 길잖아요 은서가. Her legs and arms are really long. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [은서] 은서의 랜덤게임 🐶💃🎮 Ep.02
vlive.english: Her legs and arms are really long.
